title: Stronger - Full Stack Developer & Cybersecurity Expert

home.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
home.subtitle: About Me
home.bio: I'm a passionate developer and pentester who loves building and breaking things. My journey began in middle school, where my fascination with video games led me to learn coding through an abandoned Dragon Ball project. Since then, I've explored Java, Unity, and fully committed to development and cybersecurity after high school. I thrive on mastering new topics and created a micro-framework that marked my shift from coder to developer. I enjoy backend development for its challenges, and frontend for the joy of reproducing designs. Cybersecurity excites me for the thrill of hacking. Outside tech, I love video games, manga, chess, and basketball. Driven by curiosity, I aim to create impactful games and systems for Africa.

ui.title: Frontend Development & Websites Optimization
ui.description: Create engaging user interfaces with performance optimization for a seamless user experience

details.first: Design responsive websites optimized for all screen sizes
details.second: Develop dynamic web applications using React or Svelte
details.third: Utilize Git for version control and collaborative development
details.fourth: Optimize websites for fast loading times and performance

backend.title: Backend Development & API Integration
backend.description: Develop secure and scalable backend systems to support modern web applications

details.first: Build RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints for efficient data handling
details.second: Develop backend systems with Node.js, Express, and Laravel
details.third: Manage databases (SQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL) for efficient data storage
details.fourth: Implement secure user authentication and authorization

security.title: Security Testing
security.description: Protect your applications and systems from potential cyber threats

details.second: Conduct thorough security audits to identify vulnerabilities
details.third: Perform penetration testing on web applications and networks
details.fourth: Test applications against brute-force and security exploits
